title: Dynomike: Come at Me, Bro
description: Amazon's Best Selling Author (Frankie B. Rabbit) known for "Dynomike: Back to School" brings another great story called "Come at me, Bro!" It's time for recess on a beautiful day, but Dynomike and his friends aren't excited. Instead they are fearful, and with good reason. Big Bully Bob Horn has been picking on them on the playground, and they don't know what to do. Will Dynomike's plan save them? Everyone meets a bully at some point in life, and through the quirky characters and funny rhymes in Dynomike: Come at Me, Bro, kids can learn to see bullies in a new light and deal with them without fear, creating a happier and more peaceful world for us all.
author: Frankie B. Rabbit
